input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Everlane Men's Long-Sleeve Pique Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombay Bombas Bee Better Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='PUMA Men's Bombas V Neck Tee Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Basic Tshirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Slim Crew Neck Pima Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Henley'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Essential Organic Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='EVERLANE Essential Organic Crew T-shirt'
  - Name='Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Long Sleeve Henley'
  - Name='Outerknown Ok Dot Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Outerknown Tom Blake Lifesaver Tee'
  - Name='ALLBIRDS Soft Merino Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Daily Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Capilene Cool Daily Graphic Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Organic Cotton Lightweight Henley'
  - Name='Patagonia Wind Runner Responsibili-Tee'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Signature Jacquard Crew Tee'
  - Name='Kotn Men's Easy Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Tom Blake Hawaii Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Applied Imagination Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='tentree Men's Sasquatch Classic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Tailored Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Strataspire Responsibili-Tee'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Signature Crew Tee'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Long-Sleeve Pique Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a long-sleeve polo, which differs significantly from a short-sleeve crew neck tee in both silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombay Bombas Bee Better Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This crew neck t-shirt is very similar in core type and silhouette, likely only differing in fabric detail and pocket feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PUMA Men's Bombas V Neck Tee Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While it is a tee shirt, the V-neck construction diverges from the reference's crew neck design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Basic Tshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A basic t-shirt matches the reference closely in intended use, construction, and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Slim Crew Neck Pima Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar crew silhouette and likely purpose, but differs in fabric composition (pima vs organic cotton) and possibly in cut (slim vs tailored).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Henleys have a different neck construction (button placket), but share t-shirt materials and casual intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Essential Organic Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical in type, construction, and material; only possible minor feature differences separate them.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A polo is constructed with a collar and buttons, making it less directly comparable to a classic tee, though both may use similar cotton fabrics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: EVERLANE Essential Organic Crew T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches the reference in type, silhouette, and material; the only unknowns are minor detailing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Long Sleeve Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and henley construction make it less relevant despite sharing organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Ok Dot Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck pocket tee shirts are functionally and structurally close to the reference tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Tom Blake Lifesaver Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Assuming this is a crew neck tee, it is quite similar to the reference, with potential minor design differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ALLBIRDS Soft Merino Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic tee construction is likely, but the material (merino wool vs organic cotton) is different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Daily Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The structure, purpose, and likely materials are highly similar to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Capilene Cool Daily Graphic Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely t-shirt silhouette, but it uses synthetic performance fabric (capilene), differing in use and feel from heavyweight cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Organic Cotton Lightweight Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The organic cotton and casual styling are common with the reference, but the henley construction and lightweight description differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Wind Runner Responsibili-Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As a part of Patagonia's t-shirt line, it likely shares key features with the reference, though there may be a slight performance/outdoor focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Signature Jacquard Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A crew tee is highly relevant; the jacquard fabric differentiates it slightly but not substantially.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kotn Men's Easy Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core t-shirt, crew neck, likely similar cotton material and use—highly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Tom Blake Hawaii Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Assuming crew/standard tee construction, this matches closely on the core product features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Applied Imagination Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton t-shirt, likely crew neck; nearly identical in type, silhouette, and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: tentree Men's Sasquatch Classic T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic t-shirt and intended use align very closely with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Tailored Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tailored fit, crew neck tee; matches highly with the reference on style, structure, and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's Strataspire Responsibili-Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a standard Patagonia t-shirt, very similar but may have unique sustainable materials or features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Signature Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Signature crew tee is nearly identical in silhouette, intended use, and likely material to the reference product.
